channel.title: I can't write another version of the black book
channel.description:
I'd love to see a new version of the Black Book, but realistically I don't have enough time or motivation to do it justice. Is anyone interested in completely taking over (full credit of course - it will be your project in every respect)?
Right now, I have the contents of a version of the book that was released, and then pulled back because it was too short. That's about 2 years old, but might be interesting to some people. I also have a tiny amount of content for another half hearted attempt I made at updating the book, written during the kaitneiks.com era.
Ideally the book could be written by many community members, as it's the people in here that the book is mostly supposed to be about. Nevertheless, someone would need to coordinate this, and give the new version some structure.

it’d be interesting to read about rs imo

item.title: I can't write another version of the black book
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“semaphore, post:15, topic:120647”]I’ll have a chat with winterlove. He and I chat quite a bit. As far as I am concerned, no one outside of the company knows more about that game than he does. He would be a veritable gold-mine of information. Also, psb would really be a good source of information about various and sundry aspects of the game as well; provided you can make it past that ego of his…

As for me, I wouldn’t mind editing/reviewing some of the information I wrote as it is probably out of date with the most recent client. Contrary to common[sub][size=6pt]ruler[/size][/sub]belief, I rarely, if ever, pass around misinformation. I prefer non-information. Keep in mind, misinformation is only necessary if the the marks of the misinformation are on the verge of discovering something detrimental to one’s operation. That has not been the case. Ever.[/quote]

I laughed at the Ruler part. <3 your linguistic skills.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't write another version of the black book

item.title: I can't write another version of the black book
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

eXemplar still idles in #mopar, pd can still be found on irc.freenode.net every now and then, and regex used to idle in #mopar until he posted child porn and got banned.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't write another version of the black book

item.title: I can't write another version of the black book
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:7, topic:120647”][quote author=Taios link=topic=170218.msg1576808#msg1576808 date=1183840183]
black book svn lol?
[/quote]
Funny but it sounds good. I think Krichevskoy would do good in writing a ton of this… I for one can point out a few things a few years back before the rebirth of Kaitnieks.com, but I know there’s tons of others that can easily write about the recent development.[/quote]

Thanks
I’d be glad to help out if I can. I can’t talk much about recent developments, but between Uriko, RLN, and me we should have anything recent but ‘historical’ enough that most people don’t remember well covered. Jamie put up a sort of Reinet/RSC cheating eulogy at the old domain, which might be a decent source.

If anyone is still in touch with Regex or the others (pd, exemplar, I don’t remember who else?), some words on Aryan should probably be included.

I have no idea what’s happened recently that might be of “Black Book significance”
Been taking a bit of a holiday from computer stuff. What’s going on now?

Read full topic
item.source: I can't write another version of the black book

[/quote]
It’s not nice to lie…[/quote]

Cowgod <3’s me. He said my name in the other thread =D

item.title: I can't write another version of the black book
item.dc:creator: @Brazen_Bull Brazen Bull
item.description:
@Brazen_Bull wrote:

Actually, it turns out I have more than I thought I did from the kaitnieks.com version. I have around 5000 words, including:

  • mediator talking about RSCN
  • sephamore talking about how jagex detects bots
  • a “black book investigation” on Krichevskoy’s chimp farm"
  • a not so remarkable article about a mass ban

Read full topic
